data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Spinelli, Gustavo R., Ronderos, María M., Cazorla, Carla G. (2012): A new species of Bezzia Kieffer from Argentina (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae). Zootaxa 3232: 62-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.208986
